price: হায়! দুৰ্ভাগ্য মোৰ, অমুকক যদি মই বন্ধুৰূপে গ্ৰহণ নকৰিলোঁহেঁতেন!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
